page.title: 14Machinery at Church Farm
page.content: Church farm owns about 570 acres and has five men working on it , one is a shepherd . It has 250 yews 450 lambs 100 hoggets (teenage lambs ) and 200 beef stock . The farm grows grass and cereal to feed the animals . The cereals grown are barley wheat and oats. All the machinery the farm owns is as listed. 2 ploughs,1 power harrow,2 sets of drag harrows,3 sets of rollers,1 crop sprayer,1 baler,1 corn drill,1 fertilizer,1 muck spreader,2 grass mowers,2 hay tedders,2 loaders on tractors,1 bale grab,1 bale elevator, 1 forage harvester,3 bale trailors, 3 tipping trailors,1 slurry tanker, 1 grass silos,1 corn drier,8 corn bins.
